name.desc: Specifies the name of the Application Insights component. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resourceGroup.desc: The name of the resource group in which to create the Application Insights component.

location.desc: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

retention.desc: (Optional) The workspace data retention in days. Possible values range between 30 and 730. Defaults to 30
